home-page.title: SciGateway
home-page.explore-description: Explore and visualise your data. Select and pre-process data to pull in to your analysis environment.
home-page.analyse-description: Connect to a virtual environment already equipped with the software and tools to analyse your data.
home-page.record-description: Store your results and findings, making them available to others for review and further research.
home-page.banner-one: transforming the use of real time data processing, computer simulation and data analytics...
home-page.banner-two: ...to deliver more effective research at our national facilities

cookies-page.title: Cookie Policy & Cookie management
cookies-page.cookie-policy-title: Use of Cookies, Local storage and Session Storage
cookies-page.cookie-policy:
In order to make TopCAT easy and reliable to use, we place small amounts of information on your device. These include small files known as cookies, local storage and session storage. They cannot be used to identify you personally.

These pieces of information are used to improve services for you, through enabling a service to recognise your device so you don't have to give the same information during one task or over a given time period and recognising that you have already given a username and password so you don't need to enter it for every web page requested.

You may refuse to accept cookies, local storage and session storage by activating the setting on your browser which allows you to refuse them. Unless you have adjusted your browser setting so that it will refuse cookies, local storage and session storage our system may issue cookies, local storage and session storage when you visit our site.

For more information on cookies, and how to delete and control them visit www.aboutcookies.org.uk or www.allaboutcookies.org.

The list below shows all of the cookies, local storage and session storage that are set by TopCAT.
cookies-page.essential-cookies-description: These cookies are essential for the site to function and cannot be opted out of
cookies-page.cookie-consent-description: cookie-consent cookie - this tells us the preferences you have given to which types of cookies have consented to. It expires after a year
cookies-page.scigateway-token-description: scigateway:token localStorage item - this tells us your login token so you can authenticate to the site. It does not expire until overriden by a new token or deleted manually.
cookies-page.analytics-cookies-description: These cookies help us to deliver a better user experience by telling us how users use the site and the performance of the site as well.
cookies-page.google-analytics-description: _ga, _gid cookies - Google Analytics. These cookies are used to collect information about how visitors use our website. We use the information to compile reports and to help us improve the website. The cookies collect information in an anonymous form, including the number of visitors to the website and blog, where visitors have come to the website from and the pages they visited.

cookie-consent.text: Our website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
